text: Krzysztof Kiersznowski (26 November 1950 - 24 October 2021) was a Polish actor. He was known for his roles in Vabank (1981), Fever (1981), Kiler-ów 2-óch (1999) and The Mighty Angel (2014). ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish television actors Category:People from Warsaw
title: Krzysztof Kiersznowski
